item.title: Visual Studio 2019 Web.Config Error
item.description: I’ve been randomly getting an ambiguous error message related to the web.config file for various Web Forms projects I’ve worked on in Visual Studio 2019. It states, “There is an error in web.config. Please correct before proceeding.(You might rename the current web.config and add a new one).” Ok cool, but what kind of error? What line in the web.config? Is there a misnamed setting? Is there a setting that’s out of place?
